captions.text:
DYLAN: Oh, you're showing
me Times Square!
This is not touristy at all.

DYLAN: So everybody just
kind of walks--

DYLAN: Do these people
get paid for this?

No, they kinda just
do it for fun.

It's nice to feel like you're
a part of something.

New York can be a little
bit lonely at times.

DYLAN: And you're trying
to sell me on it?

JAMIE: Every place can be
a bit lonely sometimes.
Oh, you are gonna crush it!
You can all go home now.

comments.text:
I live up the street from Times Square... its really not as amazing as they 
make it seem in the movies. There's trash everywhere in the winter. In the 
summer its so hot because of all of the buildings, and streets, you know... 
they attract heat. When its hot everybody is so tense and mad at nothing. 
But its cool at night SOMETIMES.
